= Score

`p621.posts.*Score*`

== attributes

[cols='1,1,5']
|===
|`int`
|`*upvotes*`
|number of upvotes

|`int`
|`*downvotes*`
|number of downvotes
|===

== methods

[cols='1,1,5']
|===
|`_int_`
|`*total*`
|resultant votes between upvotes and downvotes
|===


== `total`

`Score.*total*()`

resultant votes between upvotes and downvotes

=== returns

_int_ - total score
